title: I Won’t Lose!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>You’re pretty good, Ruby....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>You too, Nico-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You’re the first person other than Hanayo to finish the school idol DVD marathon without taking a break. You have great talent.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby has confidence when it comes to school idols! Ruby won’t lose to both you and Hanayo-san, Nico-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Now that’s some bold claims!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>To prove that.... Here, take a look at this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Th-.... this is!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby cut up scraps from magazines and created this book, the guide to school idols!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Amazing.... You’re amazing! There’s information on school idols all across Japan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>That’s not all.... Ruby collected the remaining information that Ruby couldn’t fit in and created the guide to school idols: part 2!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You’re really impressive! With this around, we can talk about school idols as much as we want! Let’s talk about them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
